Posts.EditableText: [url=http://www.survivetheoutbreak.com/:1zbrzgl5]This[/url:1zbrzgl5] is the one and only best zombie game I have encountered. Its an interactive movie, where along the path of it you make decisions that will decide whether you survive the Undad Apocolypse. Enjoy! [i:1zbrzgl5](Side Notes: I havn't played this yet. Running on 46k MB here! I game too much, I know. And don't tell people how you survived! We don't want to ruin the fun, so let them be eaten a while until they figure it out for themselves! )[/i:1zbrzgl5] Thana.
Posts.HTML:
This is the one and only best zombie game I have encountered.

Its an interactive movie, where along the path of it you make decisions that will decide whether you survive the Undad Apocolypse. Enjoy!

(Side Notes: I havn't played this yet. Running on 46k MB here! I game too much, I know.
And don't tell people how you survived! We don't want to ruin the fun, so let them be eaten a while until they figure it out for themselves! )

Thana.

Posts.EditableText:
I survived pretty early on (i died once or twice before getting out).

I hate the way all the options basically drill down to the same thing over and over again.. And you can't save the girl either.

Posts.EditableText:
Kinda sucks how you can't, I know.

1) Wish it was longer
2) Wish it had more choices
3) Wish I was in it
4) Clarification, Wish I was in the movie, not the actual event of a Zombie Apocolypse.

I want to play, but I'm afraid something unexpected pops up. I hate it when that happens... it scares the shit out of me.

Edit: Clicked the play button, screamed like a little girl and stopped playing immediately.
